author.title: Analytics Director @ Huge x Google | Designing Insightful Journeys Through Data, Strategy & EmpathyAnalytics Director @ Huge x Google | Designing Insightful Journeys Through Data, Strategy & Empathy

content: AI as your Baseline, not just a Goal¬†üéØ Simply checking the AI tool box without a strategy for continuous improvement risks a wasted investment, especially given the decline in sustainability funding.Billions are being invested in AI, but without a foundational approach, are we just building castles in the sand?Instead of tracking ‚ÄúHow many AI tools we rolled out this quarter?‚Äù companies should be asking, ‚ÄúHow deeply is our AI absorbing our expertise, and how is that translating into real efficiency gains?‚ÄùHere are some thought starters on how companies can shift their thinking:‚ú® AI Chatbots ‚Üí Dynamic assistantsFrom thinking about a standalone chatbot to creating an AI powered helper that learns from every interaction, think about those built in feedback loops.‚ú® AI Copy drafts ‚Üí Creativity catalystsFrom AI generated drafts to idea sparking collaborators that elevate your voice.‚ú® AI-Generated summaries ‚Üí Feedback-driven insightsFrom auto generated page summaries to continuously refined highlights driven by user feedback.‚ú® AI Search ‚Üí Conversational discoveryFrom keyword search bars to dialogue based experiences that understand intent and improve based on post search behavior.‚ú® AI Recommendation engines ‚Üí Living personalizationFrom content or product recommendations to AI models that update and optimize every month/quarter incorporating human expertise and adapting to a changing landscape.By considering AI as a baseline and not a goal can help us create a living, adaptive system that grows more valuable each day, drives future impact, and even advances sustainability.hashtag#ai hashtag#machinelearning hashtag#personalization hashtag#chatbots hashtag#continuousimprovement hashtag#aiapplications hashtag#techtrends hashtag#deeplearning hashtag#artificialintelligence

comments.content: Smart perspective‚Äîpositioning AI as foundational rather than aspirational reframes how we drive real impact. Your emphasis on feedback loops and adaptability hits the mark for what real integration should look like.
